actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to require a United States plan to endorse and obtain observer status for Taiwan at the annual summit of the World Health Assembly in May 2002 in Geneva, Switzerland, and for other  purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of State to initiate, and instructs the U.S. delegation to implement, a U.S. plan to endorse and obtain observer status for Taiwan at the annual summit of the World Health Assembly in May 2002 in Geneva, Switzerland.

titles.title: A bill to require a United States plan to endorse and obtain observer status for Taiwan at the annual summit of the World Health Assembly in May 2002 in Geneva, Switzerland, and for other  purposes.
